seo.title: Agriturismi Corniglia 2025 | Farm Stays Cinque Terre
seo.description: Agriturismi and farm stays near Corniglia. Experience vineyard accommodations, local wine production, and authentic rural hospitality.

body.title: Agriturismi near Corniglia
body.subtitle: Stay at working farms and vineyards. Experience rural Ligurian life with home-cooked meals and local wine.

features.title: Vineyard Settings
features.description: Stay among terraced vineyards producing Vernaccia wine. Wake up surrounded by grapevines and olive trees.

features.title: Home-Cooked Meals
features.description: Traditional Ligurian dinners using farm ingredients. Experience authentic cucina povera recipes.

features.title: Wine Tasting
features.description: Sample wines produced on the property. Learn about traditional winemaking from the family.

features.title: Rural Tranquility
features.description: Peaceful hillside locations above Corniglia. Escape tourist crowds in authentic countryside.

features.title: Trail Access
features.description: Easy access to hiking trails. Many agriturismi on paths connecting villages.

features.title: Local Experience
features.description: Live with farming families. Participate in harvest activities when in season.
